summary: This document is a series of email exchanges between U.S. Department of Justice personnel, primarily an Attaché in London and a recipient in the U.S., regarding scheduling a call to discuss the SDNY (Southern District of New York) investigation. The emails show coordination for a conference call, with one participant noting they will be in court.

connections.description: Coordination between DOJ personnel in London and the U.S. to schedule a call regarding the SDNY investigation.

events.title: Call scheduled regarding SDNY investigation
events.description: A conference call is scheduled between DOJ personnel to discuss the SDNY investigation.

keyFacts: DOJ personnel in London and the U.S. are coordinating a call to discuss the SDNY investigation in September 2020.
One participant mentions being in court for much of the day, indicating active legal proceedings.
The correspondence shows ongoing inter-agency communication regarding the investigation.
